expired_server: This server has been expired and will be removed in 4 days.
reinstall_success: The reinstallation of your server has been started and you'll receive an e-mail with your new credentials once the installation has been completed after the reinstallation has been successfully started
reinstall_accept: I understand, that reinstalling my server will result in a permanent and unrecoverable loss of data on my boot disk. Additional disks are not affected and will keep all their data.
select_datacenter_text: Choose your desired location from our eight datacenters worldwide. Servers within the same datacenter can be connected using our private networks.
select_your_image_text: You can either choose to (automatically) install a fresh operating system on your new server or use one of our prebuilt 1-click applications.
select_your_image_learn_more: Learn more about our installation images →
rapid_deployment: Rapid Deployment Images are usually provisioned within 30 seconds.
select_flavor_text: We offer different flavors that are performance-optimized for general workloads. You can up- or downgrade your VPS at any time.
finalize_text: Please choose your server's hostnames and optionally add SSH keys for a more secure authentication.
order_terms: By ordering a server you are accepting our terms of service.
successfully_updated: The server flavor is successfully upgraded.
successfully_created_one_text: We've successfully processed your order of server
successfully_created_many_text: We've successfully processed your order of {count} servers
successfully_created_many_error_and_succ: We've successfully processed your order of {count} servers. Unfortunately we had issues with the deployment of m server(s). The VPS2day team has been notified and will proceed to fix the issue as soon as possible. Please allow a slightly longer deployment time for your order. If you have any further trouble, don't hesitate to contact our support team.
successfully_created_many_error_text: While we've processed your order of {count} servers, we unfortunately had issues with the deployment of those.  The VPS2day team has been notified and will proceed to fix the issue as soon as possible. Please allow a slightly longer deployment time for your order. If you have any further trouble, don't hesitate to contact our support team.
no_keys: At this moment you don't have created ssh keys. You can create ssh key now.

snapshot.delete_snapshot_popup_text: Are you sure you want to delete this snapshot?

emptyStateBody: As of now you don't have any servers in your account

extend_server_runtime_modal.title: Extend Server
extend_server_runtime_modal.description: Please select the desired runtime extension for your server server-{serverId} ({serverName}).
extend_server_runtime_modal.start_server: Start the server after the extension
extend_server_runtime_modal.start_server_description: Your server is currently shut off. Do you want us to start your server automatically after the extension has been completed?

rdns_modal.title: Reverse DNS Record (rDNS)
rdns_modal.description: A reverse DNS (rDNS) entry for your IP address {ipAddress} might be necessary if you are running a mail-server on your server. If you are uncertain what a rDNS entry is, you most likely won't need it.
rdns_modal.second_description: Please be advised that the record you are planning to set needs to point to your IP address {ipAddress} - this will be automatically verified by our system.
rdns_modal.rdns_set_for_the_ip: The rDNS record will be set for this IP address.
rdns_modal.ensure_domain_point: Please ensure this domain points to your IP address and contains a website including your contact data as stated in our Terms of Service (TOS).
rdns_modal.your_user_account_authorize: Your user account is authorised to set rDNS entries without further confirmation. All changes will be applied with immediate effect.
rdns_modal.all_requested_rdns: All requested rDNS entries are subject to manual confirmation by our support staff. Please allow up to 24 hours until the record is set. Please do not open a support ticket before waiting this amount of time.

upgrade_server_modal.title: Upgrade Server
upgrade_server_modal.description: If you have outgrown your server's performance you can upgrade it to a higher tier flavor. The whole process takes less than a minute and requires a restart of your server.
upgrade_server_modal.upgrade_points: Please keep the following points in mind when initiating an upgrade
upgrade_server_modal.upgrade_point_first: Your server will be immediately rebooted
upgrade_server_modal.upgrade_point_second: To prevent data loss, save your work and close all applications in advance
upgrade_server_modal.upgrade_point_third: You can't downgrade to your old flavor once the upgrade has been completed
upgrade_server_modal.monthly_server_price: will be added to your monthly server price
upgrade_server_modal.upgrade_server_terms: By clicking on "Upgrade Server" we'll immediately withdraw €{immediatePayment} from your balance. Your monthly server price will be increased by €{monthlyPaymentIncrease} to a total of €{monthlyPaymentIncrease} per month.
upgrade_server_modal.immediate_payment: You don't have enough money on your account balance to settle the immediate payment of {immediatePayment}. Please consider charging your account balance, first.
